summary:
Does your company strife to achieve operational excellence? To provide amazing products and services to your clients and thereby remain relevant not only in todays market, but also towards the future. Is operational excellence no longer optional, but a prerequisite to retain a license to operate due to increasing regulatory requirements? That means your company is in constant change, replacing, upgrading and maintaining existing services to todays standards and adding new services to the client offering.

As an independent consultant my sole focus is to solve the challenges you are facing to achieve operational excellence. Through my unique combination of business and IT savviness I will bring your operational execution to a next level and make the complex simple again.

Specialties include:
⁃	Optimization of primary processes through redesign, lean Six Sigma optimization and digitization
⁃	Designing solutions to supporting full end to end customer journeys
⁃	Maximize value creation as a Product Owner
⁃	Manage full live cycle IT and business transformations

Equally comfortable with Agile (Scrum Product Owner), Prince2 (Practitioner) and Lean Six Sigma (Back Belt) methodologies

Skills: BPMN, Proficiency in standard office software, such as MS Office (Visio, Access, Excel, Project) MS PowerBI, Atlassian Tools (JIRA, Confluence), working knowledge of SQL, Cypher, Java, Javascript, VBA, IT architectural patterns.

Native Dutch and fluent in English
